review.title: “Take you to the peak and drop u down suddenly”
review.pros: Pros – Good salary package, environment & staff benefits...
review.cons: Cons – They use all sweet words to get the work done, feedback is never given on the face, complaints or feedback is bundled up and released on the day of resignation, making you realize the amount of time you have wasted in your career...
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Give ur feedback straight on face to the employees.. do not bundle it up and release it later... senior management should take quick decisions on the issues, allow the managers to work in peace and do not sandwich them between your flaws
